text: This is a list of Lesotho Twenty20 International cricketers who have played at least one Twenty20 International for Lesotho after playing their first match against Eswatini on 16 October 2021. ==Key== General * – Captain * – Wicket- keeper * First – Year of debut * Last – Year of latest game * Mat – Number of matches played Batting * Runs – Runs scored in career * HS – Highest score * Avg – Runs scored per dismissal * * – Batsman remained not out * 50 – Number of half centuries Bowling * Balls – Balls bowled in career * Wkt – Wickets taken in career * BBI – Best bowling in an innings * Ave – Average runs per wicket Fielding * Ca – Catches taken * St – Stumpings affected ==List of players== :Statistics are correct as of 25 November 2022. title: List of Lesotho Twenty20 International cricketers
